title: iServer
extract: iServer is a unique proposition that enables businesses to continue to use familiar Microsoft technologies, including Visio, Office, SharePoint and SQL Server, providing the most easy to use environment for planning and executing strategic change.
extract_html: iServer is a unique proposition that enables businesses to continue to use familiar Microsoft technologies, including Visio, Office, SharePoint and SQL Server, providing the most easy to use environment for planning and executing strategic change.
